description: Try our easy to follow Best-Ever Ham & Cheese Toastie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,Ham,Christmas,Comfort food,Quick & easy lunch,Leftovers,Spinach,Father's Day
name: Best-Ever Ham & Cheese Toastie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slice leg ham off the bone (thick)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a bread knife, cut 8 thick slices from the bread. Place 4 slices of bread on a chopping board. Spread each with pesto, reserving 1 tbs.
Top with ham, cheese and spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Top with remaining bread slices. Butter outside of each sandwich.
Heat a large heavy-based frying pan over medium heat. Toast sandwiches for 2-3 minutes each side until golden brown and cheese is melted.
Meanwhile, mix reserved tomato pesto with mayonnaise. Cut toasties in half and serve with pesto mayonnaise on the side.
